name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal clear sound quality. Perfect for music, calls, and gaming.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable and sustainable organic cotton t-shirt available in multiple colors. Made from 100% certified organic cotton with a perfect fit.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant and compatible with iOS and Android.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Beautiful set of 4 handcrafted ceramic coffee mugs. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for your morning coffee or as a thoughtful gift.

name: Leather Laptop Backpack
description: Professional leather laptop backpack with padded compartments for laptop and tablet. Multiple pockets for organization and comfortable shoulder straps.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip premium yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Extra thick for comfort and support during yoga, pilates, and fitness workouts.

name: Wireless Phone Charger
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator and overcharge protection.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and eco-friendly design.
